live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
46779.summary: Some customers in the West End area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
46779.title: Feb 12 - Vancouver  (West End) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
46776.summary: Some customers located between Michipicoten to Wawa are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
46776.title: Feb 12 - From Michipicoten to Wawa | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
